long_description: With a long runtime and three bright white LEDs, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 10-Day lantern will keep fun camping festivities going long after the sun sets. Four D batteries (sold separately) provide up to 260 hrs. (that's 10 days!) of use on low, 40 hrs. on high and 155 hrs. on SOS strobe. Two 1W Nichia LEDs output up to 160 lumens on high. Built-in recessed hook in the base of the lantern lets you hang the lantern upside down to cast light down on a work area. Ultimate Survival Technologies 10-Day lantern has ABS-plastic housing with rubberized zones to endure impacts. Closeout.
short_description: With a long runtime and three bright white LEDs, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 10-Day lantern will keep fun camping festivities going long after the sun sets.
